title: The 11-inch MacBook Air and two other models will become obsolete later this month
content:
Apple is famous for the long and active support it provides for its products. When you buy one of the company’s devices, you’re investing in what you know will receive (software and hardware) support for years to come. And that’s very reassuring for customers because people want to have this kind of peace of mind.

The post The 11-inch MacBook Air and two other models will become obsolete later this month appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The 11-inch MacBook Air (Early 2014), 13-inch MacBook Air (Early 2014), and 13-inch MacBook Pro (Mid 2014) will become obsolete on April 30.
